import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome" import { faInstagram } from "@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons" import { faArrowUp } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons" export default function Footer() { function scrollToTop() { window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: "smooth", }) } return (
Home About Blog ⤷Writing ⤷Podcasts ⤷Teaching Redeeming Heartache Events Coaching Contact
